summary: An ordinance establishing, modifying and abrogating certain positions in the Law, Civil Service, Police, Engineering, Park and Lighting Depts. and in the offices of the Comptroller and Board of Public Works, fixing compensations; superseding the 1960 Salary Ordinance (88800), as amended, insofar as in conflict, and providing funds by making budget item transfers; and changing the titles of positions titled "Stenographer-Clerk" to "Stenographer-Clerk II".
